snippet: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe® Connect web conferencing software
name: Adobe Connect

features.speciality: We are an Authorized Adobe® Reseller. But we do more than just sell you the software - we can implement it and train your entire team, too!

drumrolls.VantagePoint: View and interact with all your students while you present online, just like a real classroom but with no real estate used in Connect. A game-changer for online learning.
drumrolls.rPhone: The most advanced teleconferencing application available for Adobe Connect. Supports audio breakouts, voice-to-text transcription, SIP phones and much more.
drumrolls.talkingStick: Stream HD video from unlimited webcams and remote sources including video cameras, desktop windows, video capture devices, or any other USB video device.
